burtis.modules.sync

Class SynchronizationModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.AbstractNetworkModule
      • burtis.modules.sync.SynchronizationModule

  • public class SynchronizationModule
extends AbstractNetworkModule
    Synchronization source for all time-dependent modules along with a module failure controller. Sends TickEvent according to the internal state.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński, Amadeusz Sadowski

      • createWatchdogService

        private static WatchdogService createWatchdogService(ModuleConfig syncConfig,
                                                     java.lang.Runnable shutdownAction)
        Creates list of modules from default network configuration, ignoring 'itself', and provides it to WatchdogService's constructor.
        Parameters:
        syncConfig - - 'itself'
        shutdownAction - - provided to service constructor.
        Returns:
        Prepared service.

      • printNetworkConfig

        private static void printNetworkConfig(NetworkConfig netConfig,
                                       java.lang.String moduleName)
        Lists modules to console, describing which are critical. Omits itself.
        Parameters:
        netConfig - - list of all modules.
        moduleName - - to know itself.

      • doStep

        public void doStep()
        Makes one step of simulation. If simulation was running automatically it is paused and then one step is made.

      • init

        protected void init()
        Description copied from class: AbstractNetworkModule
        Called at the beginning of AbstractNetworkModule.main(). The module is already connected and AbstractNetworkModule.send(SimulationEvent) works.
        Specified by:
        init in class AbstractNetworkModule
